entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
